name: driver-management-system
description: Full-stack driver management system with React frontend and Bun backend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "green,blue" "cd server && bun run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "green,blue" "cd server && bun run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd server && bun install && cd ../client && npm install
